buyer.official_name: Department of Housing Local Government and Heritage

procedure.title: Request for Tender for the control of Rhododendron ponticum in Wild Nephin National Park - Spring 2024
procedure.description: In summary, the Services comprise of the control of Rhododendron ponticum in Wild Nephin National Park. Location: Letterkeen, Newport, Co. Mayo. (Rhododendron control 23.7 ha treatment area) Pricing is to be inclusive of labour and materials. The required approach is Glyphosate application using treatment methods appropriate for local conditions. Further details, including proven treatment methods, are included in Appendix 1 of this RFT.
